name: RiskAngle
headline: AI medical summaries in minutes
description: RiskAngle delivers fast, accurate summaries of unstructured medical records for insurance companies and law firms. Our AI-powered platform enables users to streamline underwriting, expedite claims processing, and prepare cases with confidence.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:legal; industry:insurance; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: William Hu, Founder
founders.description: Building RiskAngle, an AI platform for summarizing medical records. Previously @ Robinhood and Retool.

RiskAngle converts unstructured medical records into clear, concise summaries. We organize your records into chronologies.

[Join Waitlist![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b1RtRZwGkvELDLcce0qbepINS10.svg)](https://www.riskangle.com/<https:/forms.gle/Zg9gur56ZT8zgyXv5>)
Built by an experienced team from
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/EvZoFn0OdsM2c85mrmVvfbvog.png)

Insurance
Legal
## Navigate medical records, effortlessly
We transform thousands of pages of medical records into summaries tailored for insurance.
##### Risk Assessment
Integrate your underwriting and claims manuals to identify risk factors in seconds.
##### Knockout Questions
Get answers to knockout questions instantly. Know whether your clients qualify from the start.
##### Document Chat
Find precise answers to your questions without digging through hundreds of pages of records.
![feature-image-01](https://framerusercontent.com/images/wInpWkfJ8CEkumtceXs8HCepy0.png)
### Reduce binding time by 30%
With RiskAngle, you no longer need to wait on third party services. You can process up to 3x more documents without hiring additional staff.
### Lower per-summary costs by 40%
RiskAngle leverages AI to provide summaries at a fraction of the cost. In addition, we are faster and more accurate than human annotators.
![feature-image-01](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x3Ht6yFEM0YurW9b4tdoVPDEeg.webp)
![feature-image-03](https://framerusercontent.com/images/o2jO8YMLp7sLJMEccweVVWhfxlw.png)
### Integrate securely
RiskAngle is both SOC 2 compliant and HIPAA compliant. We take security and privacy seriously.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ay60oQxQ9HGB7LWUzt1GWl4sQn0.svg)
SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ay60oQxQ9HGB7LWUzt1GWl4sQn0.svg)
HIPAA Compliant
## Featured Use Cases
[Life Underwriting![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b1RtRZwGkvELDLcce0qbepINS10.svg)Extract the information you care about and cut the turnaround time from weeks to days.](https://www.riskangle.com/<./life-underwriting>)[Workers' Comp Claims![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b1RtRZwGkvELDLcce0qbepINS10.svg)Implement a fast and effortless evaluation for workers’ compensation claims.](https://www.riskangle.com/<./workers-comp>)[Disability Claims![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b1RtRZwGkvELDLcce0qbepINS10.svg)Leverage fast, accurate, and concise medical record summaries for disability claims.](https://www.riskangle.com/<./disability-claims>)[Long-Term Care![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/b1RtRZwGkvELDLcce0qbepINS10.svg)Get a comprehensive view of conditions, treatments, and functional limitations for long-term care.](https://www.riskangle.com/<./long-term-care>)

generated_description:
### Overview of RiskAngle

**Founded:** 2024  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S24  
**Website:** [RiskAngle](https://www.riskangle.com)

**Mission Statement:**  
RiskAngle aims to revolutionize the way insurance companies and law firms interact with medical records. By delivering AI-generated medical summaries in minutes, RiskAngle transforms unstructured medical records into clear, concise documents that are organized chronologically.

### What They Do

Initially focusing on the needs of the insurance and legal sectors, RiskAngle harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to streamline critical processes like:

- **Underwriting:** Helps assess risks swiftly by integrating underwriting and claims manuals.
- **Claims Processing:** Expedites claims evaluations, allowing companies to react more quickly without relying on third-party services.
- **Case Preparation:** Facilitates lawyers in obtaining precise information through a document chat feature that answers questions without sifting through piles of paperwork.

### Key Features

1. **Speed and Efficiency:** RiskAngle significantly reduces binding time by up to 30% and can process 3x more documents without increasing staffing costs.
2. **Cost Savings:** Their AI approach lowers per-summary costs by approximately 40% compared to human annotators—faster and more accurate.
3. **Security and Compliance:** They prioritize data protection, ensuring compliance with SOC 2 and HIPAA regulations to safeguard sensitive information.

### Target Users

RiskAngle is primarily beneficial for:

- **Insurance Companies** looking for efficient underwriting solutions.
- **Law Firms** that need precise medical summaries for case preparation, especially for workers' compensation and disability claims.
- Organizations needing to navigate the maze of complex medical records quickly and accurately.

### Team and Support

David Lieb serves as their Group Partner, guiding the company's growth strategy within the competitive landscape of B2B SaaS solutions.

### Why It Matters

The increasing complexity of medical records poses challenges for legal and insurance professionals. RiskAngle directly addresses these challenges, transforming time-consuming processes into streamlined, efficient workflows. Their innovative use of AI not only saves time and money but also enhances the accuracy and reliability of medical documentation.

### Conclusion

If you're entrenched in insurance or legal work and often find yourself lost in a sea of medical records, RiskAngle might just be your lifeboat. With a sharp focus on AI-powered solutions and a commitment to accuracy, they’re primed to redefine professional interactions with medical data.

For more information or to discuss how RiskAngle can assist with your needs, check out their website or book a call through their [Contact page](https://www.riskangle.com/<https:/calendly.com/william-zephr/riskangle-intro-call>).
